text: Hi Guian. Back from my holiday.  We posted a lovely member profile this month on a stop motion animator. <http://www.animatedwomenuk.com/heathercolbert_illustrator_and_animator/>

attachments.title: Member profile | Heather Colbert | Illustrator and Animator - Animated Women UK
attachments.text: What inspired you to start Stop-motion Animation? I came to animation through my illustration degree; we had a puppet making project in our 1st year that ignited my interest in stop motion and puppet making. The character I made was a Frankenstein’s monster-style slave, doomed to an eternity of stirring a vat of fudge! ItContinue reading →
attachments.fallback: Animated Women UK: Member profile | Heather Colbert | Illustrator and Animator - Animated Women UK

text: Hi hope you had a great holiday, thanks for this post.

I had a great holiday.  Thank you. Are you going away this summer?  Also do you have a blog or online presence with any of your work?  I'm putting out some feelers to see if we can get you some work experience.
thanks I just came back from a holiday last week as well. I do have a blog in wordpress that's details my work in college it's called 'interactive media and games design- Guian benson-quarm'
Where did you go?  Did you have a good time?  With friends or family?
First  I went to Scotland with family about two weeks ago, and I just came back from a camping trip with my girls brigade last week
Sounds nice.  I'm from Scotland. Where did you go?
to Glasgow and then to Oban sell and in the way home we stopped in Edinburgh
